Hero.title: Haut en Couleur
Hero.subtitle: Painting Contractor in Rennes
Hero.description: Expertise and quality for your painting projects

Company.title: OUR COMPANY
Company.description1: Based in Mordelles, Haut en Couleur puts its expertise at the service of your painting and renovation projects.
Company.description2: Specialist in interior painting and exterior painting, we work professionally on all types of projects, from private individuals to businesses.
Company.description3: Our service area extends 35 km around Rennes, allowing us to respond quickly to your needs.
Company.description4: We are committed to providing quality work, attentive listening to your expectations, exemplary responsiveness and impeccable quality in each of our projects.

q1.question: What are your rates?
q1.answer: Our rates vary depending on the nature and scope of the work. We offer free, personalized quotes. Feel free to contact us for an accurate estimate of your project.

q2.question: Do you work for individuals and businesses?
q2.answer: Yes, we work for both individuals and businesses (offices, shops, etc.). We adapt our services to your specific needs.

q3.question: What is your service area?
q3.answer: We operate within a 35 km radius around Mordelles, covering Rennes and its surroundings, including Chavagne, Br√©al-sous-Montfort, Le Rheu, Bruz, and many other municipalities in Ille-et-Vilaine.

q4.question: Do you offer emergency services?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer emergency services to respond quickly to your needs. Contact us by phone for more information.

q5.question: Do you provide materials?
q5.answer: Yes, we provide all the materials necessary to complete your work. We work with recognized quality brands to ensure a lasting result.

q6.question: How long does the work take?
q6.answer: The duration of the work depends on the size and nature of the project. During our visit to provide a quote, we will give you an accurate estimate of the timeline.

q7.question: Do I need to prepare my home before you arrive?
q7.answer: We take care of protecting your furniture and floors. However, it is preferable to clear the rooms as much as possible to facilitate our work.

q8.question: Do you offer warranties on your work?
q8.answer: Yes, all our work is guaranteed. We are insured and you benefit from the legal warranties in force.

q9.question: How does a quote work?
q9.answer: Contact us by phone or through our form. We will arrange an appointment to visit your project, assess your needs, and provide you with a free, no-obligation quote.

q10.question: Can I choose my own colors and finishes?
q10.answer: Absolutely! We advise you on the choice of colors and finishes, but the final decision is yours. We can also work with your own supplies if you wish.

SeoHome.block1Title: Painting company in Rennes and surroundings
SeoHome.block1Content: Haut en Couleur, your painting contractor located in Mordelles, near Rennes, supports you in all your painting and renovation projects. With several years of experience, we put our expertise at the service of individuals and businesses for quality services. Whether you need interior painting, coating, wallpaper installation or flooring, our qualified team is here to listen and realize your desires.
SeoHome.reason1: Professional expertise: A team of qualified painters with several years of experience in the painting industry.
SeoHome.reason2: Quality work: We pay particular attention to detail and finishing for an impeccable result that lasts over time.
SeoHome.reason3: Listening and advice: We take the time to listen to your needs and advise you on the best solutions adapted to your project and budget.
SeoHome.reason4: Responsiveness and punctuality: We respect the agreed deadlines and are available to answer your questions throughout the project.
SeoHome.zonesSubtitle: We operate within a 35 km radius around Mordelles, covering Rennes and many municipalities in Ille-et-Vilaine:
SeoHome.moreCities: And many other municipalities in Ille-et-Vilaine (35)

QuiSommesNous.heroSubtitle: Discover the history and values of Haut en Couleur
QuiSommesNous.teamDesc1: Our team is composed of a qualified professional painter who is passionate about their craft.
QuiSommesNous.teamDesc2: Each member of our team has several years of experience in the building painting field and regularly attends training to stay up to date with the latest techniques and innovations in the sector.
QuiSommesNous.teamDesc3: We are proud of our expertise and are committed to offering you a superior quality service for all your painting projects.
QuiSommesNous.value1Desc: We only use top quality materials and apply the best techniques for a lasting result.
QuiSommesNous.value2Desc: We take the time to listen to your needs and expectations to offer you solutions adapted to your project.
QuiSommesNous.value3Desc: We are committed to meeting agreed deadlines and intervening quickly in case of emergency.

MentionsLegales.metaDescription: Legal notice of the Haut en Couleur website, painting company in Mordelles.
MentionsLegales.heroSubtitle: Legal information regarding the Haut en Couleur website

section2.title: 2. Website Host
section2.name: Name: OVH SAS
section2.website: Website: www.ovh.com

section3.title: 3. Intellectual Property
section3.paragraph1: All content on this website (texts, images, videos, logos, etc.) is the exclusive property of Haut en Couleur, unless otherwise stated.
section3.paragraph2: Any reproduction, distribution, modification, adaptation, retransmission or publication of these various elements is strictly prohibited without prior written consent from Haut en Couleur.
section3.paragraph3: The trademarks and logos present on the website are registered by Haut en Couleur or by third parties. Any use of these trademarks without authorization is prohibited.

section4.title: 4. Personal Data Protection
section4.paragraph1: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify, delete and object to personal data concerning you.
section4.paragraph2: To exercise these rights, you can contact us:
section4.contactMail: By mail: Haut en Couleur, 22 Le Domaine, 35310 Mordelles, France
section4.paragraph3: For more information on the management of your personal data, please consult our Privacy Policy.

section5.title: 5. Cookies
section5.paragraph1: This website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience and analyze traffic.
section5.paragraph2: You can configure your cookie preferences from your browser. To learn more, consult our Privacy Policy.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.paragraph1: Haut en Couleur strives to ensure the accuracy and updating of the information published on this website. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, precision or completeness of the information made available on this website.
section6.liability1: For any inaccuracy, error or omission relating to information available on the website
section6.liability2: For any damage resulting from fraudulent intrusion by a third party that resulted in modification of the information made available on the website
section6.liability3: For any direct or indirect damage resulting from the use of the website

section7.title: 7. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
section7.paragraph1: This legal notice is governed by French law.
section7.paragraph2: In the event of a dispute and failing an amicable agreement, the dispute will be brought before the French courts in accordance with the applicable rules of jurisdiction.

section8.title: Any questions?
section8.paragraph1: For any questions regarding this legal notice, please contact us:

CookiesPage.metaDescription: Cookie usage policy for the Haut en Couleur website. Information about cookies used and your rights.
CookiesPage.heroSubtitle: Information about cookie usage on our website

section1.title: What is a cookie?
section1.content: A cookie is a small text file placed on your computer, tablet or smartphone when visiting a website. Cookies allow the website to recognize your device and remember certain information about you, to facilitate your navigation and offer you a personalized experience.

section3.title: How to manage your cookies?
section3.paragraph1: You can choose to disable these cookies at any time. Your browser can also be configured to notify you of cookies being placed on your computer and ask you to accept them or not.
section3.browser1: Chrome: Menu > Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies
section3.browser2: Firefox: Menu > Options > Privacy and security > Cookies
section3.browser3: Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Cookies and website data
section3.browser4: Edge: Settings > Privacy > Cookies and site permissions

section4.title: Retention period
section4.content: Cookies are stored for a maximum period of 13 months from their first deposit on your device. At the end of this period, your consent will be required again.

section5.title: Your rights
section5.paragraph1: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the Data Protection Act, you have the following rights:
section5.right1: Right to access your personal data
section5.right3: Right to erasure of your data
section5.right4: Right to object to the processing of your data

section6.title: Contact us
section6.paragraph1: For any questions regarding our cookie policy or to exercise your rights, you can contact us:

essential.title: 1. Essential cookies (required)
essential.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function. They cannot be disabled.
essential.cookie1: cookie_consent: Records your choice regarding cookies (duration: 1 year)

security.title: 2. Security cookies
security.description: These cookies help us protect our website against malicious activities.
security.cookie1: hCaptcha: Anti-spam protection on the contact form (duration: session)

analytics.title: 3. Analytics cookies (optional)
analytics.description: These cookies allow us to understand how you use our website to improve it. You can refuse them without affecting your browsing experience.
analytics.cookie1: Google Analytics: Statistical analysis of traffic (duration: 2 years)

PolitiqueConfidentialite.metaDescription: Privacy policy and personal data protection of Haut en Couleur.
PolitiqueConfidentialite.heroSubtitle: How we protect and use your personal data

intro.paragraph1: At Haut en Couleur, we attach great importance to protecting your privacy and your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
intro.paragraph2: By using our website, you accept the practices described in this policy.

subsection1.title: 2.1. Data Collected Directly
subsection1.intro: When you use our contact form or contact us by email, we collect the following information:
subsection1.item5: Message and content of your request

subsection2.title: 2.2. Automatically Collected Data
subsection2.intro: When you browse our site, we may automatically collect:
subsection2.item4: Referral source (how you arrived on our site)

section3.title: 3. Purposes of Processing
section3.intro: Your personal data is collected and processed for the following purposes:
section3.purpose1: Processing your requests: Responding to your questions, quote requests and information requests
section3.purpose2: Customer relationship management: Monitoring your project, communication about work progress
section3.purpose3: Site improvement: Analyzing site usage to improve our services
section3.purpose4: Legal obligations: Complying with our legal and regulatory obligations
section3.purpose5: Marketing (with your consent): Sending you information about our services, promotions and news

section4.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
section4.intro: The processing of your personal data is based on:
section4.basis2: Contract execution: For processing your quote request or performing work
section4.basis3: Legitimate interest: For improving our services and site security
section4.basis4: Legal obligations: To comply with our accounting and tax obligations

section5.title: 5. Data Recipients
section5.paragraph1: Your personal data is intended for the internal services of Haut en Couleur.
section5.paragraph2: We may also share your data with:
section5.recipient1: Our technical service providers (hosting, site maintenance)
section5.recipient2: Our partners for carrying out certain work (subcontractors)
section5.recipient3: Competent authorities in case of legal obligation
section5.paragraph3: We ensure that these third parties respect the confidentiality and security of your personal data.

section6.title: 6. Retention Period
section6.intro: Your personal data is retained for the period necessary for the purposes for which it was collected:
section6.duration2: Customers: 10 years for accounting and tax obligations
section6.outro: At the end of these periods, your data is deleted or anonymized.

section7.title: 7. Your Rights
section7.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
section7.right1: Right of access: Obtain confirmation that your data is being processed and access to this data
section7.right2: Right of rectification: Correct your inaccurate or incomplete data
section7.right3: Right to erasure: Request deletion of your data under certain conditions
section7.right4: Right to restriction: Limit the processing of your data in certain cases
section7.right5: Right to object: Object to the processing of your data for reasons relating to your particular situation
section7.right6: Right to portability: Receive your data in a structured format and transmit it to another controller
section7.right7: Right to withdraw your consent: At any time, without affecting the lawfulness of processing based on consent before withdrawal
section7.exerciseIntro: To exercise your rights, you can contact us:
section7.exerciseMail: By mail: Haut en Couleur, Mordelles, 35310, France
section7.responseTime: We are committed to responding to your request within one month.
section7.cnil: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the CNIL (French Data Protection Authority) if you believe your rights are not being respected: www.cnil.fr

section8.title: 8. Cookies and Similar Technologies
section8.intro: Our site uses cookies to improve your browsing experience.

subsection1.title: 8.1. What is a Cookie?
subsection1.content: A cookie is a small text file stored on your device when you visit our site. It allows us to recognize you on your next visits.

subsection2.title: 8.2. Types of Cookies Used
subsection2.type1: Essential cookies: Necessary for the site to function (cannot be disabled)
subsection2.type2: Analytical cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site
subsection2.type3: Preference cookies: Allow us to remember your choices (language, region)

subsection3.title: 8.3. Managing Cookies
subsection3.intro: You can manage your cookie preferences directly from your browser:
subsection3.chrome: Chrome: Menu > Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies
subsection3.firefox: Firefox: Menu > Options > Privacy and security > Cookies

section9.title: 9. Data Security
section9.paragraph1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against accidental or unlawful destruction, loss, alteration, disclosure or unauthorized access.

section10.title: 10. Data Transfers Outside the EU
section10.content: Your personal data is hosted and processed within the European Union. If we were to transfer your data outside the EU, we would ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place in accordance with GDPR.

section11.title: 11. Policy Modifications
section11.paragraph1: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Any modification will be published on this page with a new update date.
section11.paragraph2: We encourage you to regularly consult this page to be aware of any modifications.

contact.title: Questions About Your Data?
contact.intro: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or your personal data, contact us:

SeoContentQuiSommesNous.block1Paragraph1: Founded in 2010, Haut en Couleur is a family-run painting company based in Mordelles, near Rennes. We have built our reputation on the quality of our work, our attentiveness, and our closeness to our clients.
SeoContentQuiSommesNous.block1Paragraph2: Our philosophy is simple: to offer a professional painting service with personalized support from the beginning to the end of your project. Each project is unique, and we adapt to your specific needs.
SeoContentQuiSommesNous.block1Paragraph3: Whether for interior painting, exterior painting, or applying decorative coatings, we put all our expertise at your service.
SeoContentQuiSommesNous.commitment1Desc: Over 10 years of experience in the building painting field
SeoContentQuiSommesNous.commitment2Desc: Use of eco-friendly paints that respect your health
SeoContentQuiSommesNous.commitment3Desc: We guarantee the quality and durability of our achievements
SeoContentQuiSommesNous.commitment4Desc: Help choosing colors, finishes, and materials suitable for your project

SeoContentPrestations.block1Title: Your painting work in Rennes with confidence
SeoContentPrestations.block1Paragraph1: Haut en Couleur is your painting company in Rennes for all your interior painting, coating, wallpaper installation and flooring projects.
SeoContentPrestations.block1Paragraph2: Whether you want to refresh your interior, install wallpaper or renovate your floor, our professional painter puts their expertise at your service.
SeoContentPrestations.block1Paragraph3: Based in Mordelles, we operate throughout the Rennes region and surroundings for quality painting work, carried out in compliance with standards and your expectations.
SeoContentPrestations.service1Desc: Walls, ceilings, woodwork - We paint all your interior spaces with care. Color selection, decorating advice, and impeccable finishes.
SeoContentPrestations.service2Desc: Application of smoothing coating, filling and surface preparation. For a perfect finish before painting.
SeoContentPrestations.service3Desc: Professional installation of non-woven, vinyl and panoramic wallpaper. Perfect seams and neat finishes.
SeoContentPrestations.service4Desc: Installation of lino, PVC, carpet for all your spaces. Surface preparation and professional installation.
SeoContentPrestations.step1Desc: We come to your home to assess your needs and take measurements
SeoContentPrestations.step2Desc: Clear proposal with work details and transparent pricing
SeoContentPrestations.step3Desc: Professional painting work with site protection and cleaning
SeoContentPrestations.step4Desc: Quality control and touch-ups if necessary for your satisfaction
SeoContentPrestations.benefit1Desc: Our professional painters complete your work quickly and efficiently, allowing you to quickly enjoy your new space.
SeoContentPrestations.benefit2Desc: Professional techniques, suitable equipment and expertise guarantee impeccable and durable finishes.
SeoContentPrestations.benefit3Desc: Help choosing colors, finishes and products suitable for your project and budget.

SeoContentRealisations.block1Paragraph1: Discover our painting projects throughout the Rennes region. Each project is unique and reflects the personality and needs of our clients.
SeoContentRealisations.block1Paragraph2: Whether for renovating a house, painting an apartment, or decorating professional offices, we bring the same care and attention to detail.
SeoContentRealisations.block1Paragraph3: Our interior painting, wallpaper installation and flooring work demonstrate our expertise and our commitment to offering perfect finishes. Browse our gallery for inspiration and imagine what we could create for you.
SeoContentRealisations.project1Desc: Bedrooms, living rooms, kitchens, bathrooms - We transform all your interior spaces
SeoContentRealisations.project2Desc: Application of smoothing coating and filling for a perfect finish
SeoContentRealisations.project3Desc: Non-woven, vinyl, panoramic wallpaper - Professional installation with perfect seams
SeoContentRealisations.project4Desc: Installation of lino, PVC, carpet for all your spaces with neat finishes
